name: GIANT OTTER - ENDANGERED SPECIES SERIES #6 of 200
description: A series of 200 NFTs on Hic Et Nunc by Marc CraiG of Endangered Species from countries around the world. Giant otters, endangered top predators which live in Amazon river ecosystems, were nearly wiped out because of demand for their fur. Following the banning of fur trade, giant otter numbers have recovered across South America. However, there are several emerging threats to this sensitive species.
